item.title: Obsidian Quality of Life Requests
item.description: %% Status:: #in-progress %% Tags:: #obsidian #obsidian-garden Links:: File Enhancements Add support for an ignore file (.obsidianignore) that allows files and folders to be added that [Obsidian] will ignore and not load into the UI or consider in the database Add a [Front Matter] property ignore: true that when added removes the file from the graph - useful for template files and other files that are temporary.
